comment.author: 70889503@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Historical Gardens, and we'd love to have this added to the group! The correct translation is 'Hemelse Berg' (Divine Mountain). In the old spelling that is used on the photo there's a 'ch' between the s and the e, but it is difficult to read.

comment.author: 11971485@N05
comment._content:
Spectacular series!

Indeed this is the Eendjesvijver , still existing, in Oosterbeek, about 4 miles from Arnhem in the park  'De Hemelsche Berg". I used to play there, some 60 years ago.

Pete van der Kleut
